source: Antislop paper (Paech et al., 2025) - Section 6.5, Appendix C/L
description: Structural sentence patterns overrepresented in LLM output

patterns.name: not_x_but_y
patterns.description: The 'It's not X, it's Y' construction family - 6.3x overrepresented
patterns.note: Catches any subject (not just it/this/that), period-separated variants. One per article may be deliberate. Three means the model was driving.

patterns.name: not_just_but
patterns.description: The 'not just X, but Y' variant
patterns.note: Common in analytical AI writing as a both-sides framing device

patterns.name: worth_noting
patterns.note: Delete the preamble, start with the observation

patterns.name: hedging
patterns.note: State things or question them. Don't hedge.

patterns.name: ai_enthusiasm
patterns.description: AI enthusiasm markers in conversational text
